thread.section_title: Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value for NYC
thread.title_full: Good value for NYC - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gnolect
title: Good value for NYC
text:
As a Hampton Inn goes, this is pretty basic. Lobby is nothing to speak of. Room was small but comfortable. My only complaint was the bathroom has no counter or shelf so there is no where to put anything near the sink. NY is a noisy city and the windows are not particularly tight so just don't mind the noise all night long, but it didn't bother me.
The front desk staff were very cheerful on check in and check out.
I didn't use he wifi so I cannot comment. I didn't bother with the morning breakfast because there are better coffee shops all around.
A really nice feature was being able to precheck in and select my own room online. Nice touch! More hotels need to start doing this.
Overall for NYC, I thought the price of my room at $120 was amazing. It is not plushy but clean, comfortable and excellent value for a big city.
